data.snippet:
Expertise:

Claudiu Popa has been the founder since 1989 of the Informatica Group of Companies. Claudiu Popa is also the co-founder of Canada’s only cybersafety education foundation, KnowledgeFlow. Since 2009, the Foundation has been home to the famous UnHackable brand that empowers Canada’s youth to embrace a culture of cyber safety and build a Circle of Trust within their communities. Among other innovations, he is behind the Verify Risk Assessment methodology used by businesses and government agencies across Canada. [...] Professionally, Claudiu Popa is a trusted advisor to government agencies, municipalities, non-profit organizations, businesses of all sizes and NGOs on matters of regulatory compliance, information security strategy and risk management. In addition to being an educator through the University of Toronto, Seneca College, Ontario Tech University, the Standards Council of Canada, provincial Law Societies and Privacy Commissioner Offices, Claudiu Popa is also a certified professional who acts as an interim CISO, CPO, DPO, breach coach or board level Risk Advisor.

With over 30 years of experience in information technology security, auditing, international standards, and board-level risk advisory, he is no stranger to sharing his wealth of knowledge with eager audiences.

Expertise: [...] Participants will gain insights into cutting-edge threat detection technologies, secure remote access methods, and the advantages of cybersecurity insurance. The talk further explores the necessity of comprehensive security risk assessments, incident response planning, and the implementation of secure collaboration tools to safeguard sensitive information.

Claudiu’s approach not only equips organizations with the knowledge to combat ransomware and financial cyber threats but also emphasizes the importance of digital privacy and the protection of the supply chain. By attending this session, professionals and businesses will be better positioned to navigate the complexities of cybersecurity, ensuring their operations are resilient against the onslaught of cyber threats in the digital era.

## CLAUDIU POPA BIOGRAPHY

Claudiu Popa has been the founder since 1989 of one of Canada’s leading Information Security Company. Claudiu Popa is also the co-founder of Canada’s only cybersafety education foundation. Since 2009, the Foundation has been home to the famous UnHackable brand that empowers Canada’s youth to embrace a culture of cyber safety and build a Circle of Trust within their communities. Among other innovations, he is behind the Verify Risk Assessment methodology used by businesses and government agencies across Canada. [...] Professionally, Claudiu Popa is a trusted advisor to government agencies, non-profit organizations, businesses of all sizes and NGOs on matters of regulatory compliance, information security strategy and risk management. In addition to being an educator through the University of Toronto, Seneca College, Ontario Tech University, the Standards Council of Canada, provincial Law Societies and Privacy Commissioner Offices, Claudiu Popa is also a certified professional who acts as an interim CISO, CPO, DPO, breach coach or board level Risk Advisor. [...] Claudiu Popa is also an information security technologist whose primary research on cybercrime, digital literacy, cyberfraud, national security, intellectual property protection and personal information breach prevention has been published and featured extensively through hundreds of articles, books and conference talks. Claudiu Popa is a university adjunct professor and college lecturer, having worked extensively with standards bodies, educational institutions and task forces on international standards like ISO, PCI, SOX, PbD and numerous others. All efforts are a testament to Claudiu’s passion in support of raising the bar on data security and the protection of human rights, particularly in the age of ubiquitous cloud storage, generative AI and edge computing.
